duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide 1:1 quality care to patients and families in various settings, such as patient homes or healthcare facilities.
Collaborate with patients, families, Registered Nurses, physicians, facility partners, and care teams to ensure quality care.
Assist patients with daily activities, ambulation, toileting, bathing, eating, and drinking.
Perform post mortem care, obtain vital signs, and assist with treatments and homemaker assistance.
Document patient care activities and changes in condition in electronic health records.
Communicate with the interdisciplinary team and provide patient, family, and facility partner education.
Participate in meetings to plan and evaluate patient/family services and precept new staff and students.
Maintain professional boundaries with patients, families, and co-workers, and use proper body mechanics and safe patient handling.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited Certified Nursing Assistant program and current, unrestricted Nursing Assistant Certification in the state of employment
